comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
<introContext>
...
<group id="page-content" filteredFrom="swt">
    <group id="overview-links" label="Introduction">
	<link label="Test" url="http://org.eclipse.ui.intro/showPage?id=test"
					id="highlights">
		<text>
			test
		</text>
	</link>
    </group>
</group>

...
<page id="testID" style="css/test.css">
     <include path="overview/header" />
	<group id="page-content" filteredFrom="swt">
		<html id="test" src="$plugin:test.test$intro/test/index.html"
				type="inline" />
	</group>
</page>
...
</introContext>

More information:
get the following error:
java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: $plugin:test.test$intro/test/index.html
at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:567)
at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:464)

at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.html.IntroHTMLGenerator.generateIntroHTML(IntroHTMLGenerator.java:470)

at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.html.IntroHTMLGenerator.generateIntroDiv(IntroHTMLGenerator.java:381)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.html.IntroHTMLGenerator.generateIntroElement(IntroHTMLGenerator.java:256)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.intro.impl.html.IntroHTMLGenerator.generateBodyElement(IntroHTMLGenerator.java:228)

...
etc.
*** Bug 203046 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I was able to reproduce using I20070911-0833. It looks as though there is no attempt to decode the $plugin:plugin_name$ section of code.
